title: Funk the Font - Tephra
content:
Dalton Maag has released Tephra, a new font created in collaboration with renowned designer Hamish Muir. To see Tephra in action go to [http://www.daltonmaag.com/tephratestbed](http://web.archive.org/web/20131013095800/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/tephratestbed "http://www.daltonmaag.com/tephratestbed")

Bruno Maag  
Dalton Maag Ltd
author: bruno_maag
